name: Teuta Qebaptore
address: 603 E 186th St, Arthur Ave, Bronx, NY 10458, USA

reviews.text: Great food, Great service, and Great Experience overall. Beautiful restaurant.
$16 for a simple small bean soup no extra drink  ** Expensive .. menu photos +5 years old

Poor customer service!

Ordered qyfte, found hair on them gave it to the server she just brought back the same one, new plate, hair removed. Not even trying to hide it. Disrespectful and disappointing.
Dining at Qebaptore Teuta was a delightful experience from start to finish. The food was exceptional, the staff attentive, and the ambiance was perfect for a cozy evening. Highly recommended
Fire food and a hidden gem in the Bronx qofte and qebap are amazing
Excellent food and Service
Reminds me of being back in Tirana. The best in NYC

This is as good as it gets, this little place service some really authentic and fresh Albanian/balkan food, their bread is ALWAYSSS fresh and so are their meats. Highly recommend if you’re looking authentic Balkan food.
Delicious home style Albanian food. Everything fresh from scratch .
Service was poor, food was awful, overall I will never come again.
Best qevapa and grosh in town!!
Tasty food. Great service. Decades of the same good and stable service. I strongly recommend it.
Decent place for quick Albanian bite.

Very good food at unbeatable prices.
I highly recommend!

Best Albanian Restaurant in NY! Every time my husband and  i visit NY from FL we not only make it a priority to enjoy lunch there but we call a few days in advance and order Sausage to take back home with us! The staff is very friendly and…
The quebab are still  good along with the salad, however the beans soups today were to watery and  hardly any flavor,the goulash was not a goulash but a beef soup. They are starting to cut corners
Grate place and food

We ordered and got stuck in traffic for about 45 minutes and when we arrived they had sold our order without calling and were incredibly rude when we complained about our order being sold. When they made our next order they tried to give us raw meat, and not for the first time. Incredibly disappointed as we’ve always supported this Albanian business. I would give them 0 stars if I could.
Delicious Albanian cuisine! Super friendly staff followed by amazing food!
Good food, i recomend it
Amazing Shum Mir
Tasty food and welcoming atmosphere
Everything is great here. From the food to the service.

Teuta e perzin mishini e derrit me te lopes .jam shku mi ble zorrt  ku punon ne italian place aty ku esht Arthur Ave edhe kam vet ah kini zorrt te lopes me ka thon po edhe mi ka dhon te derrit edhe kur e veta me me ki rrejt me tha mu se…

Everything in this place is wonderful.  Delicious food, good service, affordable prices, etc.
The restaurant owners are the best!
Definitely recommend :)
Visiting from Texas and this was the best qebaptore we have had in the US! Authentic, hard worker, quality food and superb service!
The food is amazing
Ohhhhhh qebapa tmira
The best place l recommend to everyone
I wish they gave rice but the food is very tasty
Amazing food

Beautiful Albanian restaurant tucked in Little Italy. Great ambience, great prices, great food. I went in looking for authentic Albanian food for the first time and came out speaking Albanian. Thats how authentic it is. 100% recommend.
Delicious affordable Albanian food. Definitely recommend!
I love this place. Food is amazing, fast service. I really love their light salad!
This place is amazing, from their food to every one who works there. A friend of mine recommended their suxhuk and I have been hooked since.
The combo is the perfect amount of food and the suxhuk is 10/10.
The best qevapa and qufte in usa,and food
Great food.

This is a cute little place with awesome food, though the people working there are not most friendliest. The food is awesome and the service is quick, the place is super clean. There is a restroom inside, finding parking around there is…
Great service, clean place, great prices and portions, can you believe 2 people can eat there with 25$, including tax and tips? Yes

Great place to bring friends and family...
Or dine alone. Your choice.
No judgement there. :)

Great mix of people having a great time and enjoying good south-eastern European food.

You can really just walk in here and ask for anything, and you'll like it.

Heavy on the meats, lots of dairy, and nice bean soup variations (to kill for).

I get the Pasul/fasul/etc (bean soup) with meat... I stay switching the meats up :)

Go and enjoy yourself.
The others def are.
I always take my food to go from here . Tasty food Very clean, respectful personnel and easy off the street. And did I say it’s pretty inexpensive? Ok good
Their Chivapa are always fresh, cooked over a grille, and taste perfect. The bread they give you is the best in the area. I love this spot!

Great food propely cooked and always fresh, never overseasoned. Outstanding salad as well. Very very tasty and the service was outstanding and made the food taste even better. Qebapa qebapa edhe qebapa hahah po edhe suxhuk.
Beautiful place, very good food, and exelant service , you will love
If you care for great authentic Albanian food,  this is the place to go. Clean and friendly.
Great Albanian traditional comfort food. Cozy little, family operated restaurant.
Small place with the best Albanian food. I go there whenever I'm in NY
A cozy place with mouth melting dishes. Steak is awesome and so is sudjuk.

Hands down the best Qebapa you can get in New York.

Annoying to have to pay for water....but not gonna knock a star off for that.
Good food. Great prices very good expirience

Delicious Food
Great Service !
Lovely Restaurant
Fresh food, great price
Friendly people who treat you like family.
Best Qebaba in the World period.
Best cevapi in New York city!!!
